patthana16.76:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.76:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.76:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.76:5.1: Hetuyā cha, sahajāte nissaye kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana16.76:6.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naanupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.76:7.1: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte nava, kamme cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
